trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 13}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 2d8+5}) acid damage.

entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Goblin Totem is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The Goblin Totem has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Goblin warlord makes four attacks with its Spiked Chain.

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage. The goblin warlord can force the target to make a contested Athletics ([[@{npc_athletics}+1d20]]) check. On a failed saving throw, the target is grappled and pulled towards the goblin warlord up 5 ft.

trait.name: False Appearance (Cursed Tree only)
entries: While the cursed tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Bloodied Resistance
entries: Upon taking damage that would reduce the creature to 0 hit points or lower, the creature returns to full hit points, and the creature immediately ends all negative conditions on itself. Once this feature activates, it cannot activate again until the creature takes a long rest. This effect can occur even when taking normally lethal damage, such as from power word kill

trait.name: Tactics Change
entries: When Bloodied Resistance activates, the cursed tree becomes a Rot Tree, or if Bloodied Resistance is activated by fire damage it becomes a burning tree. This determines which abilities it uses.

action.name: Multiattack (Burning Tree only)
entries: The cursed tree makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage (Cursed Tree), poison damage (Rot Tree), or fire damage (Burning Tree).

legendary.name: Summon (Cursed Tree only)
entries: The cursed tree summons [[{@dice 1d2+1}]] Vine Blights.

legendary.name: Summon (Rot Tree only)
entries: The cursed tree summons [[{@dice 1d2+1}]] Needle Blights.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The werewolf alpha can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the werewolf alpha fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The werewolf alpha has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Leader
entries: The werewolf alpha's allies have advantage on melee attack rolls against any hostile creature within 5 feet of the werewolf alpha.

action.name: Multiattack (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The werewolf alpha makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, they must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Leap
entries: The werewolf alpha moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Bark Orders
entries: The werewolf alpha chooses a friendly creature who can see or hear it. That creature can use its reaction to move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Frenzy (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The werewolf alpha can make one claw attack against each creature within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition charmed}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only one target {@condition charmed} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition charmed} by it or a willing creature. The target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

headerEntries: George Cuddlebelly is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). George Cuddlebelly has the following wizard spells prepared:

monster.name: Atlantis Sentinel
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Adamantine Structure
entries: Atlantis Sentinel is made of adamantine. It can absorb and nullify magical damage. Doing so charges its core.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Atlantis Sentinel deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Pearl Core
entries: Atlantis Sentinel has an energized core which it uses as a capacitor for its Retaliating Blast. After expending a charge, Atlantis Sentinel loses its magical immunities and cannot expend another charge until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Target Lock
entries: Atlantis Sentinel must seek and aim before using its Disintegration Ray.

action.name: Disintegration Ray
entries: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take [[{@damage 10d6}]] radiant damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

reaction.name: Retaliating Blast
entries: Atlantis Sentinel uses a charge in its Pearl Core to retaliate a magical attack. A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from it. Each creature in a 90-foot sphere originating from it must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes [[{@damage 2d8}]] thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from it. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed. Creatures at least 60-foot away from it make the saving throw with advantage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Volatile Cask
entries: The kobold carries a cask of flammable alcohol on its back. While it does so, the kobold can't use its hands to make attacks or use actions, and fire damage the kobold takes is also taken by the cask.

When the cask takes fire damage, roll a [[{@damage 1d10}]]. If the result is less than the fire damage dealt, the cask erupts in a 10-foot radius explosion. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking [[{@damage 4d6}]] fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Flammable objects in the area not being worn or carried ignite.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Roll Cask (1/Day)
entries: The Kobold rolls its carried cask in a straight line 15 feet in a direction of its choice. The cask then continues to roll 15 feet at the start of each of the kobold's turns, accelerating, decelerating, or changing direction with the terrain at the GM's discretion.

The cask is an object with an AC of 10 and 10 hit points (immunity to poison and psychic damage, vulnerability to fire damage), and which retains the applicable portion of the Volatile Cask trait above. If the cask collides with a creature or a solid surface, both it and what it collides with take [[{@damage 1d10}]] bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it moved this turn.

If the cask is destroyed by fire damage, the Volatile Cask trait is triggered automatically. If it is destroyed by damage of a different type, it creates a 5-foot radius pool of flammable alcohol on the ground where it was destroyed. Any fire damage dealt in the pool's area ignites it, forcing each creature in the area to succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take [[{@damage 2d6}]] fire damage as the alcohol burns up.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Flammable Spirits
entries: The kobold carries many bottles filled with highly-flammable alcohol. As a bonus action on each of its turns, the kobold can stuff a rag into the opening of an alcohol bottle it is carrying and ignite it using a nearby open flame, causing its next Hurl Bottle attack to use its ignited effects.

action.name: Broken Bottle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hurl Bottle
entries: If the bottle was not ignited, the target is soaked in flammable alcohol. The next time a soaked target takes any fire damage, that fire damage is increased by [[{@damage 1d6}]] as the alcohol burns away. If not ignited, the alcohol evaporates harmlessly after 1 minute.

If the bottle was ignited, hit or miss, it shatters in a fiery explosion. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes [[{@damage 2d4}]] fire damage and is ignited on a failed save, or takes half as much fire damage and is not ignited on a successful one. An ignited target takes [[{@damage 1d4}]] fire damage at the start of each of its turns, and can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.
A flammable object in the area ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

entries: The jackal has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sand Structure
entries: If the jackal takes fire damage equal to half of its remaining hit points, it solidifies into glass.

entries: The lava drake has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lava drake's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Lava Spit {@recharge 5} [[1d6]]
entries: Lava Drake spits out 1 foot thick molten rock-metal amalgam up to 60 feet. The lava stays hot for a minute, forcing each creature to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes [[{@damage 2d8}]] fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. Lava on the ground keeps dealing [[{@damage 1d8}]] fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within. A creature takes the same damage when it enters for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

monster.name: Verazin Lemmad
languages: can speak Primordial but is fluent in Ignan

trait.name: Fire Adept
entries: Any spell or effect Verazin creates ignores resistance to fire damage and treats immunity to fire damage as resistance to fire damage.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Verazin  has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Sense Magic
entries: Verazin senses magic within 120 feet of him at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

action.name: Shadow Blade

trait.name: Agressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

trait.name: Primal Rage
entries: The orc has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws and has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage..

trait.name: Crushing Build
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage when she hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d8 + 5} plus {@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 5} plus {@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Battle Cry (1/Day)

legendaryGroup.name: Orc War Baron
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the orc can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects: it can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: [[1d2]] orcs come rushing to aid the orc from up to 60 feet close to the orc.

regionalEffects: The region containing the dragon's lair is warped by its magic, creating one or more of the following effects:
If the Oaken Bolter is destroyed, these effects fade over the course of 1d10 days.

legendary.name: Command
entries: One orc within 120 feet of the orc can either move up to half its speed or make a single weapon attack.

legendary.name: Collateral Damage
entries: The orc makes an attack towards a target withing 5 feet that it had not attacked in its last turn.

legendary.name: Menacing Stance
entries: The orc makes an intimidating pose and attempts to frighten the target. The target must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it is frightened of the orc until the end of the orc's next turn.

reaction.name: Enduring Disarm
entries: When the orc is hit by a melee attack, it can choose to turn it into a critical hit and use its reaction to grab the weapon from its attacker's hand on a failed contested Athletics check ([[[[2d20kh1]]+8]]). The weapon is thrown 10 feet away from the orc in the direction of the orc's choice.

monster.name: Venom Queen
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak them

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The venom queen can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Spider Telepathy
entries: The venom queen can magically command any spiders within 120 feet of it using telepathy.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the venom queen knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Rappel
entries: While clinging to a wall or ceiling, the venom queen can fall any distance without taking damage, landing silently on its legs.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The venom queen ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The venom queen makes two attacks with its claws, one of which can be replaced with a bite attack. It can also make a web attack, if recharged.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw.

On a failed save, the target takes [[{@damage 4d10}]] poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition poisoned}. A creature {@condition poisoned} by this attack has its movement speed halved and repeats its save at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on a success.

If the poison damage from this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Venom Spittle
entries: Each creature in a 5-foot wide, 30-foot long line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw.

On a failed save, a creature takes [[{@damage 4d8}]] poison damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much poison damage and is not {@condition blinded}.

action.name: Summon Brood (1/Day)
entries: The venom queen magically calls [[{@dice 1d4}]] venom crawler hatchlings and [[{@dice 1d4}]] venom crawlers. The called creatures arrive in [[{@dice 1d4}]] rounds, acting as allies of the venom queen and obeying its telepathic commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the venom queen dies, or until the venom queen dismisses them as a bonus action.

action.name: Web {@recharge 4} [[1d6]]
entries: The venom queen uses one of the following web effects.

action.name: Binding Web
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 40/80 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 14} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 12; hp 15; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage). If the target is already {@condition restrained} by webbing, then until freed, it also becomes {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened}, it can't make attacks, and the DC to burst the webbing increases to 16.

action.name: Snaring Strand
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 40 ft., one creature. {@h}A tough, rubbery strand of webbing attaches to the target in a straight line. While this strand is attached, the creature can't move further from the venom queen than the length of the strand, the venom queen can't use its web action on another target, and as a bonus action on each of the venom queen's turns, it can force the target to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled up to 20 feet closer to the venom queen, simultaneously shortening the length of the attached web strand by the same distance. The web strand can be attacked and destroyed (AC 13; hp 15; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage), or the venom queen can choose to detach it at any point on each of its turns (no action).

legendary.name: Detect

The first time on a turn that the venom queen enters the space of a creature that isn't a spider, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 [[{@damage 2d8}]] piercing damage.

A creature that touches the shrimp or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes [[{@damage 1d6}]] poison damage and is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Thunder Claw
entries: The halocline shrimp makes a claw attack and a 30-foot cone blast travels. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking [[{@damage 2d8 + 5}]] bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: The halocline shrimp magically turns transparent and is considered {@condition invisible} until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

action.name: Clench
entries: The abyssal grappler clenches onto the target's face. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the abyssal grappler can't use its clench on another target. While grappled in this way, the abyssal grappler injects its acid to liquefy the target's insides and the target takes [[{@damage 5d6}]] acid damage at the start of each of its turns. Attempting to remove the abyssal grappler, agitates it to release more acid.

action.name: Volcanic Rock

Each creature within 10 feet of impact point must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking [[{@damage 6d8}]] fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The dragon leviathan makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the sea dragon, and it takes [[{@damage 6d6}]] acid damage at the start of each of the dragon leviathan's turns.

If the dragon leviathan takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the dragon leviathan must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the dragon leviathan. If the dragon leviathan dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the dread can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the dread that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dread fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dread makes six attacks, but can use its lunge only once.

action.name: Sun Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) radiant damage.

action.name: Lunge
entries: The dread taps into the hatred inside, releasing a crimson fog around. For the turn, the dread's speed is doubled. The dread does not provoke opportunity attacks while moving in this manner and can make an attack with sun blade as a part of this action.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature misses the dread with a melee attack, the dread can use a reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the creature.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The dread parries one ranged or melee attack that would hit.

legendary.name: Push
entries: The dread extends his hand to release a shock wave. A target within 60 feet must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@damage 1d10} force damage and is pushed 15 feet away from the dread in a straight line. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and is pushed 5 feet.

legendary.name: Pull
entries: The dread extends his hand to drag a target within 60 feet towards the dread. The target must make a {@dc 16} Strenght saving throw. On a failed save, it is pulled 20 feet towards the dread in a straight line. On a successful save, it tis pulled 5 feet.

legendary.name: Grasp
entries: The dread attempts to grasp a creature within 60 feet and hold it captive. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} until the dread's concentration ends or until the target leaves the dread's reach.
The {@condition grappled} target can escape by succeeding on a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check.
While a target is {@condition grappled} in this manner, the dread can take an action to move the target 20 feet or crush the target for [[{@damage 5d10}]] force damage

action.name: Whirling Blade
entries: The dread throws its weapon to travel in a circular path. The weapon covers a 30-foot sphere centered on the dread. Any creature in the are must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a fail, creatures take {@damage 1d8+7} radiant damage. On a success, creatures take half damage.

action.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: The dread magically turns {@condition invisible} until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the dread wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

action.name: Shadow Step
entries: The dread magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Doing so reveals its previous and current location momentarily.

action.name: Hatred Incarnate {@recharge 5} [[1d6]]
entries: The dread unchains its fury, extending it to its enemies around. Each creature 30 feet close to the dread must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, creatures take [[{@damage 6d6}]] psychic damage. On a success, creatures take half as much damage.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature misses the dread with a melee attack, the dread can use a reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the creature.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The dread parries one ranged or melee attack that would hit.

legendary.name: Push
entries: The dread extends his hand to release a shock wave. A target within 60 feet must make a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@damage 1d10} force damage and is pushed 15 feet away from the dread in a straight line. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and is pushed 5 feet.

legendary.name: Pull
entries: The dread extends his hand to drag a target within 60 feet towards the dread. The target must make a {@dc 20} Strenght saving throw. On a failed save, it is pulled 20 feet towards the dread in a straight line. On a successful save, it tis pulled 5 feet.

legendary.name: Grasp
entries: The dread attempts to grasp a creature within 60 feet and hold it captive. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} until the dread's concentration ends or until the target leaves the dread's reach.
The {@condition grappled} target can escape by succeeding on a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check.
While a target is {@condition grappled} in this manner, the dread can take an action to move the target 20 feet or crush the target for [[{@damage 5d10}]] force damage

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the dread can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the dread that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dread fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: While the dread is holding the Iuz Stone, it regains half of its missing hit points at the start of its turn. If the stone is taken from the dread, the stone turns to ash and the dread loses the hit points it recovered during the combat. The dread dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dread uses its Hatred Incarnate and Implosion. It then makes two attacks, but can use its lunge and whirling blade once each.

action.name: Sun Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d8 + 9}) radiant damage.

action.name: Whirling Blade
entries: The dread throws its weapon to travel in a circular path. The weapon covers a 20-foot sphere centered on the dread. Any creature in the are must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a fail, creatures take {@damage 1d8+6} radiant damage. On a success, creatures take half damage.

action.name: Implosion
entries: The dread draws its enemies in a 60-foot radius sphere centered on it closer. Each creature inside the are must make a Strength saving throw. On a fail, creatures are pulled up to 30 feet towards the dread. On a success, creatures are pulled 5 feet.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

action.name: Sun Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dread's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). The dread can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 0} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A {@condition blinded} creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mephit uses its blinding breath. It then makes a claw attack

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blinding Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of blinding dust. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell sleep}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking [[{@damage 2d8}]] slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one..

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mephit uses its frost breath. It then makes a claw attack

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of cold air. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking [[{@damage 3d4}]] cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell fog cloud}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking [[{@damage 2d8}]] fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of magma.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mephit uses its fire breath. It then makes a claw attack

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking [[{@damage 3d4}]] fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell heat metal} (spell save {@dc 13}), requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14 Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mephit uses its mud breath. It then makes a fist attack

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mud Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit belches viscid mud onto one creature within 5 feet of it. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell grease} (spell save {@dc 13}), requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mephit uses its cinder breath. It then makes a claw attack

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Cinder Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the mephit's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell dancing lights}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take [[{@damage 2d8}]] fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mephit uses its steam breath. It then makes a claw attack

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4+1}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Steam Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking [[{@damage 3d4})]] fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell blur}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rotting Gaze
entries: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Weird Insight
entries: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Wisdom (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.
